Okay,
Here's what Hollywood needs to do.
They need to keep the formula of only running these shows as they do in Korea the usual 16-24 episodes.
They can easily do this during their summer schedules.
If they try and make it into a fall schedule series it just will not work.

I never listened to KPOP before I watched My Name is Kim Sam Soon... They had a song that was played constantly in that drama and it got stuck in my head.. I researched on who they were and boom.. They were my gateway drug into KPOP
This album is just perfect... I love it. I just ordered it. Clazziquai never disappoints me. They are the first kpop I discovered and truly loved and still love.

I am loving this song and MV so much.
So, glad Clazziquai is back!!!
A lot of people are speculating he is rapping about OUTSIDER who use to be on the Sniper Sound label. Outsider sued the label over money and Sniper Sound threw there own lawsuit at Outsider.
